text: is a Japanese cross-country skier. She competed in the women's 15 kilometre classical at the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Japan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nagano Prefecture
title: Emiko Sato
